trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The turtle can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Stable
entries: Whenever an effect knocks the turtle {@condition prone}, it can make a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw to avoid being knocked {@condition prone}. A {@condition prone} turtle is upside down. To stand up, it must succeed on a {@dc 10} Dexterity check on its turn and then use all its movement for that turn.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) slashing damage.
